definition: Christian Johann Doppler, Austrian physicist who discovered the Doppler effect
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

sentences.english: ABSTRACT OBJECTIVE:To determine the value of color Doppler ultrasound examination in diagnosis of testis and epididymis diseases.
sentences.chinese: 探討彩色多普勒超聲檢查診斷睾丸附睾疾病的價值。

sentences.english: C-band pulse Doppler weather radar receiver is described in detail in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種C波段脈衝多普勒天氣雷達接收機。

sentences.english: Stability of an Iterative Dual-Doppler Wind Synthesis in Cartesian Coordinates.
sentences.chinese: 笛卡爾座標系中迭代雙多普勒風合成的穩定性。

sentences.english: For pregnant or lactating women, it was appropriate to use the color Doppler examination.
sentences.chinese: 而對於妊娠或哺乳期婦女，宜使用彩色多普勒檢查。

sentences.english: General Imaging, Dual Color Compare Mode, High-Q Auto Doppler Analysis.
sentences.chinese: 通用影像，雙色對比模式，高品質自動多普勒分析。

sentences.english: The method can be used to deal with measuring velocity from Doppler radar of the rocket-assisted cartridge.
sentences.chinese: 該方法可以用於火箭增程彈多普勒雷達測速數據處理。

sentences.english: Objective To study the value of Color Doppler sonographic on aortoarteritis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究多發性大動脈炎的彩色多普勒超聲診斷價值。

sentences.english: The problem of short term frequency stability is one of the key-link techniques in Doppler-velocity measurement.
sentences.chinese: 頻率短期穩定度問題是多普勒測速關鍵技術之一。

sentences.english: Does migraine break out period should the patient do classics skull much general to strap an examination?
sentences.chinese: 偏頭痛發作期的患者要做經顱多普勒檢查嗎？

sentences.english: The Doppler Velocity Log(DVL) simulation system for the underwater vehicle has been built in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文建立了水下機器人的多普勒測速聲納仿真系統。

sentences.english: Objective: To analyse the applied value of Color Doppler ultrasound on cryptorchidism.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析彩色多普勒超聲在診斷隱睾症中的應用價值。

sentences.english: DV Doppler waveform of this dextrocardia fetus showed a nearly ab- sent atrial systole wave.
sentences.chinese: 右位心胎兒DV多普勒血流波形的心房收縮波近缺失。

sentences.english: The blood flow of cauda equina was measured with laser Doppler flowmeter.
sentences.chinese: 應用激光多普勒血流儀檢測馬尾神經血流量。

sentences.english: Color Doppler can be regarded as an efficacious method in diagnosis of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 彩色多普勒可作爲診斷乳腺癌的一種有效的檢查方法。

sentences.english: Propagation of the light-wave is just the same as that of the sound-wave;
sentences.chinese: 光波的傳播和聲波一樣存在多普勒效應。

sentences.english: In this case, your baby’s heart rate will be checked periodically with a Doppler.
sentences.chinese: 這時將會使用多普勒胎心儀來定期監控寶寶的胎心率。
